import React, { useState } from "react"; export default function Contact() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ nombre: "", correo: "", categoria: "", mensaje: "", }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(null); const handleChange = (e) => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setLoading(true); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:4000/api/contact", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); if (response.ok) { setSuccess(true); setFormData({ nombre: "", correo: "", categoria: "", mensaje: "" }); } else { setSuccess(false); } } catch (error) { console.error("Error enviando formulario:", error); setSuccess(false); } setLoading(false); }; return (
